data: {"color":"default","parent":[{"annotations":{"bold":true,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":false,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"見出しを示すタグ","href":null},{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":false,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"と","href":null},{"annotations":{"bold":true,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":false,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"段落を示すタグ","href":null},{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":false,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"、","href":null},{"annotations":{"bold":true,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":false,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"改行を示すタグ","href":null},{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":false,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"のみを用いて、以下のような文字だけのページを記述しましょう。","href":null}]}

{"color":"default","parent":[{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":false,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"ただし、「大宮キャンパス紹介」は","href":null},{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":true,"code":false,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"見出しサイズ１","href":null},{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":false,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"、「設置学部」「歴史」「所在地」「アクセス」は","href":null},{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":true,"code":false,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"見出しサイズ２","href":null},{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":false,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"、「目次」は","href":null},{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":true,"code":false,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"見出しサイズ３","href":null},{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":false,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"としてください。\n長々とした日本語の文章を打ってもらう必要はないので、必要な部分を以下からコピペしてくださいね","href":null}]}

{"color":"default","parent":[{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":false,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"龍谷大学 大宮キャンパスについて簡単に紹介します。","href":null}]}

{"color":"default","parent":[{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":false,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"大宮キャンパスは龍谷大学発祥の地で、370年の歴史を誇る学舎です。\n国の重要文化財に指定されている本館を有します。","href":null}]}

{"color":"default","parent":[{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":false,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"1639年(寛永16年)に京都西本願寺境内に創設された学寮が起源である。\n明治の学制改革により「大教校」と改められ、1879年(明治12年)に現在の講堂が完成。\n龍谷大学が日本最古の大学と言われる所以である。","href":null}]}

{"color":"default","parent":[{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":false,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"〒600-8268 京都府京都市下京区大工町１２５−１","href":null}]}

{"color":"default","parent":[{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":false,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"次：","href":null},{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":false,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"3. リストに関するタグ","href":"/posts/curriculums/24ba501e-f337-806f-b46c-ceef79e9cbfc","mention":{"type":"prossedPage","content":{"iconUrl":"https://www.notion.so/icons/list_red.svg","iconType":"external","title":"3. リストに関するタグ"}}},{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":false,"color":"default"},"plain_text":" ","href":null}]}
